title: Scottie Scheffler Won The Masters, But Golf Is Not A Sport | Daily Best of April 11
description:
Scottie Scheffler won the 2022 Masters and that leads us to debate and decide that golf is not a sport. In other news, more video surfaces and exposes the horror of Shanghai lockdowns as Chinese residents scream from their apartment balconies in mass numbers. Also, Dr. Fauci finally concedes that it's up to Americans to decide themselves how much 'risk they want to take' because Covid isn't going away. And lastly, Joe Biden can't think of a single word to describe America while Kamala Harris wishes everyone a "good morning" during the afternoon.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
